text: Rafael of Orléans-Braganza (born 24 April 1986, Petrópolis, Brazil) is a member of the Imperial House of Brazil. He is Prince of Brazil according to monarchists disputed claims of the Imperial House of Brazil 'of Vassouras branch. He is the second in the line line of succession to the extinct Brazilian throne as heir to his uncle Bertrand of Orléans-Braganza following the death of his father Antônio, Prince Orléans-Braganza in 2024. He was born in Petrópolis. He is the son of a widely considered [but yet disputed] non- morganatic marriage between the then Prince Antônio of Orleans-Braganza the Belgian Princess Christine of Ligne.https://web.archive.org/web/20140714150724/http://www.ibem.org/arquivos/outros/artigo_3.pdf An entrepreneur, Prince Rafael currently lives in London where he co-owns a consulting firm. Active in promoting the legacy and restoration of the Brazilian monarchy, he participates in monarchist events and represent the Brazilian Imperial Family in Europe. ==Titles, styles and honors== ===Titles and styles=== *26 April 1986 – 15 July 2022: His Highness Prince Rafael , Prince of Orleans-Braganza *15 July 2022 – present: His Imperial and Royal Highness The Prince of House Imperial ===Honors=== As member of the House of Orléans-Braganza, he is recipient of the following orders: * Grand Cross of the Imperial Order of Pedro IBUYERS, Christopher.
